name: The Best Car Game
description:
An exciting game about driving. Open world, 20 cars + 1 BONUS. Text was translated in Google Translator, sorry for the mistakes.

Controls

W=Gas, S=Brake, A=Left, D=Right, Space=Handbrake, E=Engine Kill, Shift=Gear Up, Ctrl=Gear Down, C=Change Camera, F=Drive Car

Instagram   https://www.instagram.com/gevorg.games/
